meta_title: MRO Inventory Turnover Calculation: The 2026 Efficiency Benchmark
meta_description: 70% of maintenance budgets are wasted on obsolete stock. Mastering the MRO inventory turnover calculation is the first step toward predictive profitability in
title: The Definitive Guide to MRO Inventory Turnover Calculation for Modern Manufacturing

hero_image.alt: Hero image for The Definitive Guide to MRO Inventory Turnover Calculation for Modern Manufacturing

image_prompt: A professional, photo-realistic wide shot of a modern, well-organized industrial storeroom. In the foreground, a diverse team of two maintenance professionals (one man, one woman) are collaborating. They are wearing clean, high-visibility vests, hard hats, and safety glasses. One person is holding a ruggedized industrial tablet (showing only the back of the device), while the other is pointing toward a neatly labeled rack of spare parts like motors and gearboxes. The background shows a clean, brightly lit warehouse environment with organized shelving units and a glimpse of a manufacturing floor through a distant doorway. The focus is on the professional interaction and the organized state of the facility. No text or screens are visible. Full-body view of the professionals.
